name: Senator Gary Peters
tweet_text: I also discussed the case of Paul Whelan, who remains held by Russian authorities. It is past time for Paul to come back home, where his family has advocated tirelessly for his release.

name: Senator Gary Peters

name: Senator Gary Peters
tweet_text:

Today’s attacks on the Capitol are dangerous, unacceptable and an attack on our democracy—and must stop.

tweet_text: While today’s expected election challenges will test our democracy yet again, one thing is certain: Joe Biden will be sworn in on January 20.

These challenges will fail but can still do tremendous damage.

name: Senator Gary Peters
tweet_text: There needs to be a clear, coherent plan that not only draws down our military presence, but clearly demonstrates how—in conjunction with our allies—the Afghan government can achieve and sustain peace. The Trump Administration has not presented such a plan.

name: Senator Gary Peters
tweet_text: The War in Afghanistan has cost American taxpayers trillions of dollars over almost two decades. We can’t keep writing a blank check and it is past time we draw this conflict to a responsible close. But the key word is responsible: today’s announcement is reckless and dangerous.
